plays.text: Goal scored by Chad Kilger assisted by Sergei Berezin and Yanic Perreault
Penalty to Alexander Karpovtsev 2 minutes for Crosschecking Chad Kilger
Goal scored by Jan Bulis assisted by Patrice Brisebois and Joe Juneau
Goal scored by Boris Mironov assisted by Tony Amonte
Penalty to Phil Housley 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Oleg Petrov
Penalty to Craig Rivet 2 minutes for Slashing Mark Bell
Penalty to Mark Bell 2 minutes for Roughing Craig Rivet
Penalty to Phil Housley 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Jeff Hackett
Penalty to Jeff Hackett 2 minutes for Delay of Game(opposing player not identified) served by Richard Zednik
Goal scored by Michael Nylander assisted by Tony Amonte and Igor Korolev
Penalty to Boris Mironov 2 minutes for Tripping Chad Kilger
Goal scored by Stephane Quintal assisted by Jan Bulis and Shaun Van Allen
